text: Ðis synd þære twegra hida landgemæra æt penedoc æt Ælfstanes brycce.
<../images/tbar.gif>andlang Osrices pulle<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on ducan seaðe.
Of ducan seaðe<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on risc hale.
Of risc hale<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on þone lytlan snæð feld.
Þæt on þone haran wiþig west<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þan hæcce be suðan cranmere.
Þonan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to wen broce.
Ondlong wen broces<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on hina gemære be norðan hege swa forð be Eadredesselde.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þan byhte to æsc apaldre leage.
Norðeweardne on þone west halh<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð on gynddinc gærstune.
Forð þonan<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð æt þære stræte.
Of þære stræte<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to west mædwan butan an furlang hina herð landes betweonan þære stræte & þære mædwe.
Andlang norð geardes þæt hit cymð be suðan stan beorh.
In þone byht of wanddinc hale forð be þam grafe<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð in þan snæde.
Of þan snæde<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð in þone norðran styfecinc in þone swin hagan.
Of swin hagan<../images/tbar.gif>on sealt leage.
Of sealt leage in þone hyrst geard.
<../images/tbar.gif>forð<../images/tbar.gif>forð on þone haran wiþig þonon ondlong þæs riþiges<../images/tbar.gif>on Osrices pulle.
Ondlong Osrices pulle<../images/tbar.gif>on Ælfstanes brycge feodecinc leage.
And<../images/tbar.gif>lytle linland eal butan anan hrycge þæm west mæstan twegen æceras on gemang hina lande.
And se westra east healh & an stycce<../images/tbar.gif>west mæstan and seo þridde hind æt dydinc cotan<../images/tbar.gif>is se ðridde æcer.

Ðonne is ealles þæs landes þreo hida II æt penedoc & I æt dydinc cotan þe Oswald bisceop bocað Hehstane his þægne ðreora manna dæg on þa gerad wyrce,<../images/tbar.gif>he wyrce<../images/tbar.gif><../images/tbar.gif>land seo unforworht into þære halgan stowe.
Ðæs II bec lociað into ryppel.
